2025-05-26 18:49:02.685 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:49:02.688 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:50:02.009 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:51:04.912 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 18:51:04.928 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:51:04.936 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:51:05.838 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

) AS t

    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:52:04.001 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:52:04.004 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:02.182 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:03.412 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 18:54:03.416 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:05.494 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:54:05.497 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:22.463 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:31.748 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 18:54:31.751 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:54:31.754 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"

2025-05-26 18:54:40.263 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 18:54:40.266 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:54:40.269 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
